title: "Welcome to the death bridge"
body:
I was playing howling abyss in a 1v1 and when i got in the game instead of saying the usual "Welcome to the howling abyss" it said 
"Welcome to the death bridge" and the next time i did a 1v1 just after that it said "Welcome to the howling abyss" can someone please explain this to me.

replies.body:
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Murder_Bridge

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Howling_Abyss
When the game starts, the announcer will occasionally say, "Welcome to the Murder Bridge!", instead of, "Welcome to the Howling Abyss!", referring to a popular fan nickname for the ARAM mode.
How come when I type in 'bitches' and 'tards' into the search bar during ban phase nothing comes up. How am i supposed to ban them from the game if i cant select them.
